thermostatSerialNumbers.title: Thermostat Serial Numbers
thermostatSerialNumbers.description: List of thermostat serial numbers to control. You can leave blank if you only have a single thermostat.

enableFanSwitch.title: Enable Fan Switch
enableFanSwitch.description: Add an additional switch that can be used for location-based automations (ON = Away, OFF = Home)

statusPollingMinutes.title: Status Polling Interval
statusPollingMinutes.description: How often to check thermostat status (in minutes). Default: 60
